meanings.definition: A person who hangs onto a strap for support on public transportation.
meanings.sent1: On the crowded bus, the tired straphangs held onto the straps tightly.
meanings.sent2: The straphangs on the subway swayed gently with the movement of the train.
meanings.sent3: The straphangs on the train looked like they were dancing with the straps.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of commuters, the straphangs stood out like acrobats on invisible ropes.
meanings.sent5: The image of the straphangs swinging from the straps stayed in my mind long after I got off the bus.
